Edit app theme Select app theme // --------------------- FAQ --------------------- Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)
What is the AMOZ app? AMOZ is a mobile application for managing orders, products, and employees in warehouses and wholesale companies. It simplifies management processes and increases work efficiency.
How do I add my company to the system? After registering, you can create a company profile by filling in the basic information. Then you can invite employees to collaborate in the system.
How do I add or edit employee information? You can edit employee information in the personnel management section. This is available for the company owner or users with the appropriate permissions.
How do I manage the product catalog? You can add, edit, and delete products and their variants. You can also configure product categories to make navigation through the catalog easier.
How are stock levels updated? Stock levels are automatically updated when orders are processed. You will also receive notifications if any product stock reaches a low level.
Which devices support the app? The app works on devices running Android, including smartphones and tablets. It supports both light and dark modes based on the device settings.
What should I do if I cannot log in? Make sure you are using the correct Google login credentials. If the issue persists, try resetting your password or contact technical support.
What information is required to place an order? To place an order, you need to provide the customer (B2B or B2C), the delivery address (if required), and generate an invoice that will be sent to the customer\'s email address.
Can I customize the app for my business? Yes, the app allows flexible customization of product catalogs, variants, and attributes, enabling you to tailor the system to your business needs.
How do I set up notifications for low stock levels? Low stock notifications are enabled by default and will be sent when the quantity of a product in stock reaches a minimum level. --------------------- About app --------------------- Application version: 1.0 \nAutors: Andrii Drobitko, Łukasz Bielawski, Oleksii Adamenko, Mikołaj kwinta
